actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tax Reduction Act of 1975 to make it clear that refunds based on credits for earned income under section 43 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 are to be disregarded in the administration of Federal and federally assisted programs.

summary.text: Specifies, under the Tax Reduction Act, that refunds based on credits for earned income under the Internal Revenue Code are to be disregarded in the determination of eligibility for Federal and federally assisted programs.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tax Reduction Act of 1975 to make it clear that refunds based on credits for earned income under section 43 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 are to be disregarded in the administration of Federal and federally assisted programs.
